page.title: 01The Area Around Loch Insh
page.content: This area is situated about the centre of Spey Valley. There is only one small vilalge called Kincraig which houses a few hundred people. Also included in this aea is Kincraig Wildlife Park which is quite large and contains quite a lot of wild animals. At present it costs five pounds for a carload of people to go in and it is popular with young children.Loch Insh is themain attraction though with its waersports centre sited at the eAst end of the Loch. Here there are facilities for a number of sports including wind surfing, canoeing and sailing, there is one railway which connects Edinburgh with Inverness running through Kincraig and one main road the A9,bypassing it. The old A9 runs through Kincraig but was replaced a few years ago by a straighter,faster road.
